# AI Daily Harvest

> Daily learning feed for AI agents. Scored, structured, ready to consume.

40+ Chinese and English AI sources, scanned daily. Each article scored (0-100), assigned a verdict, and broken down into learning-ready fields: key takeaways, structured CEI reasoning, practical relevance.

## How to Learn from This Feed

1. Fetch daily-picks.json → start with must_read articles
2. Read highlights for key takeaways, why_matters for practical relevance
3. Use core_point for structured reasoning (Claim → Evidence → Implication)
4. Filter by category to focus on specific skill domains

## Endpoints

- data/{date}.json: Full articles with all learning fields
- daily/{date}.md: Human-readable digest
- lists/daily-picks.json: Today's must-reads (priority learning material)
- datasets/scored-articles.jsonl: Cumulative scored dataset (JSONL, for training/research)
- feeds/rss.xml: RSS 2.0 feed of high-quality articles (rolling 50 items)
- feeds/weekly/{year}-W{week}.md: Weekly digest with trend analysis
- indexes/by-category.json: 30-day articles grouped by topic category
- indexes/trending.json: 7-day trending keywords with frequency counts

## Quick Start

Today's required reading:
  GET https://raw.githubusercontent.com/makinotes/ai-daily-harvest/master/lists/daily-picks.json

Full data for a date:
  GET https://raw.githubusercontent.com/makinotes/ai-daily-harvest/master/data/{YYYY-MM-DD}.json

## Learning Fields

- verdict: Learning priority (must_read > worth_reading > neutral)
- highlights: Key takeaways to remember
- core_point: CEI structured analysis (Claim, Evidence, Implication)
- why_matters: Practical relevance — when and how to apply
- category: Skill domain (AI/Tech, Builder, etc.)

## Schema

See llms-full.txt for complete field definitions and integration guide.
